attributes.action: Give himself up to the Hague International Court of Justice for war crimes committed in Afghanistan and Iraq and for being complicit in war crimes committed against the people of Palestine and Lebanon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair must be incarcerated (or at least on trial) before he attacks Iran and syria

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
